text: An average performer. The NVIDIA GTX 1070 is good, but I expected a bit more from the fan noise on the Refurbished: Acer Gaming Laptop Predator 17 G9-793-79V5 Intel Core i7 7th Gen 7700HQ (2.80 GHz) 16 GB Memory 1 TB HDD 256 GB SSD NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 17.3" Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Grade A. It's a fair choice if you can get it on a good deal.

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for AAA gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1070 in the Refurbished: Acer Gaming Laptop Predator 17 G9-793-79V5 Intel Core i7 7th Gen 7700HQ (2.80 GHz) 16 GB Memory 1 TB HDD 256 GB SSD NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 17.3" Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Grade A is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Quite disappointed with this laptop, the Refurbished: Acer Gaming Laptop Predator 17 G9-793-79V5 Intel Core i7 7th Gen 7700HQ (2.80 GHz) 16 GB Memory 1 TB HDD 256 GB SSD NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 17.3" Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Grade A. It overheats frequently when playing Fortnite, and the performance throttles significantly. The port selection has been a letdown. Wouldn't recommend.

It's a decent gaming laptop for the money. Performance is good for most games like Fortnite, but it can struggle a bit with the newest AAA titles on ultra settings with the Refurbished: Acer Gaming Laptop Predator 17 G9-793-79V5 Intel Core i7 7th Gen 7700HQ (2.80 GHz) 16 GB Memory 1 TB HDD 256 GB SSD NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 17.3" Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Grade A. The screen brightness is okay, not great. Overall, it gets the job done.

The Refurbished: Acer Gaming Laptop Predator 17 G9-793-79V5 Intel Core i7 7th Gen 7700HQ (2.80 GHz) 16 GB Memory 1 TB HDD 256 GB SSD NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 17.3" Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Grade A does what it says on the tin. Good for content creation and gaming, but the fan noise could be better. Had a minor issue with the initial setup taking longer than expected, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.
